definition: on or coming from the other side of the mountains (from the speaker), a cold dry wind that blows south out of the mountains into Italy and the western Mediterranean
details:
adjective
- on or coming from the other side of the mountains (from the speaker)
= synonyms: transmontane
- being or coming from another country
= example: being or coming from another country
noun
- a cold dry wind that blows south out of the mountains into Italy and the western Mediterranean
= synonyms: tramontana
